content: double_crochet in next 2sts 5dc in next st repeat around minus last 5dc join & fasten_off a 88dc 40sc this next round will only be worked in top of the fpdc sts there is a video explaining this as well https //www youtube com/watch v=r8okxo74dsy&feature=youtu be round 9 w/b join yarn in any fpdc pinch your 5sc together and insert hook from back to front under both loops of next fpdc st ch1 single_crochet in same sts loosely ch8 insert hook from front to back under both loops of next fpdc pinch 5sc together and insert hook from back to front under both loops of next fpdc and complete your single_crochet repeat around join 8sc 8ch lps *note work in each individual chain of the ch8 not in the ch8 space round 10 beg corner double_crochet in next 8 chs double_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in next 8 chs corner in next single_crochet repeat around minus last corner join 84dc round 11 ch3 double_crochet in next st corner in next space double_crochet in next 4sts half_double_crochet in next 13sts double_crochet in next 4sts repeat around ending w/a double_crochet in last 2sts join & fasten_off color b 48dc 52hdc aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2designs ©copyright 2014 all rights reserved universal star flower 2 round 12 w/a join in any corner chsp beg corner double_crochet in next 8sts +treble_crochet in both the 3rd double_crochet of 5dc grouping of petal tip in round 8 and next st of round 11 together + double_crochet in 7sts repeat +to+ once more double_crochet in next 8sts corner in next space 4x minus last corner join 108dc 8trc round 13 slip_stitch in next double_crochet & ch1sp beg corner double_crochet in next st ch1 skip­1 double_crochet in next st 14x corner in next space 4x minus last corner join 76dc *note if doing color change as in pic on the left join color b w/slip_stitch in any corner space round 14 ch3 double_crochet in next double_crochet corner in next space double_crochet in next 3dc double_crochet in next space fpdc in next double_crochet 13x double_crochet in next space double_crochet in next 3dc 4x ending w/a double_crochet in last st join 148dc round 15 ch3 double_crochet in next 3dc corner in next space double_crochet in next 37sts 4x ending w/a double_crochet in last 33sts join 164dc personal use/print only no pattern reproductions selling or copying allowed see my designs & videos on my blog http //myblueangels blogspot com/ download pattern on ravelry http //www ravelry com/designers/aurora­suominen my youtube https //www youtube com/user/dragonflymomof2boys size depends on your hook yarn &
